title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation

title: ProductSpace
text: goal ProductSpace provide tools analysis visualization product space.

text: can install development version ProductSpace GitHub :

title: Density — density
text: Compute density (Hausmann Klinger 2006)  based RCA proximity values.

title: Density — density
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values. PROXmat product--product matrix proximity values.

title: Density — density
text: economy--product matrix density values.

title: Density — density
text: Hausmann R, Klinger B (2006). “Structural Transformation Patterns Comparative Advantage Product Space.” CID Working Paper . 128 RWP06-041, Harvard University. doi:10.2139/ssrn.939646 .

title: Distance — distance
text: Compute distance (Hausmann Klinger 2006)  based RCA proximity values.

title: Distance — distance
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values. PROXmat product--product matrix proximity values.

title: Distance — distance
text: economy--product matrix distance values.

title: Distance — distance
text: Hausmann R, Klinger B (2006). “Structural Transformation Patterns Comparative Advantage Product Space.” CID Working Paper . 128 RWP06-041, Harvard University. doi:10.2139/ssrn.939646 .

title: EXPY — expy
text: Compute EXPY (income/productivity level country's export basket, Hausmann et al. 2007 ) based export gross domestic product (GDP) data.

title: EXPY — expy
code: expy(   expData,   gdpData,   econ = "economy",   prod = "product",   exp = "export",   gdp = "GDP" )

title: EXPY — expy
text: expData data frame matrix containing export data. data frame, columns representing economies, products, export values. matrix, economy--product matrix export values. gdpData data frame containing GDP data. econ character string (default = "economy") specifying column name economies expData data frame. prod character string (default = "product") specifying column name products expData data frame. exp character string (default = "export") specifying column name export values expData data frame. gdp character string (default = "GDP") specifying column name GDP values gdpData data frame.

title: EXPY — expy
text: data frame EXPY values.

title: EXPY — expy
text: Hausmann R, Hwang J, Rodrik D (2007). “Export Matters.” Journal Economic Growth, 12(1), 1--25. doi:10.1007/s10887-006-9009-4 .

title: PRODY — prody
text: Compute PRODY (income/productivity level, Hausmann et al. 2007 ) based export gross domestic product (GDP) data.

title: PRODY — prody
code: prody(   expData,   gdpData,   econ = "economy",   prod = "product",   exp = "export",   gdp = "GDP" )

title: PRODY — prody
text: expData data frame matrix containing export data. data frame, columns representing economies, products, export values. matrix, economy--product matrix export values. gdpData data frame containing GDP data. econ character string (default = "economy") specifying column name economies expData data frame. prod character string (default = "product") specifying column name products expData data frame. exp character string (default = "export") specifying column name export values expData data frame. gdp character string (default = "GDP") specifying column name GDP values gdpData data frame.

title: PRODY — prody
text: data frame PRODY values.

title: PRODY — prody
text: Hausmann R, Hwang J, Rodrik D (2007). “Export Matters.” Journal Economic Growth, 12(1), 1--25. doi:10.1007/s10887-006-9009-4 .

title: Proximity — proximity
text: Compute proximity (Hidalgo et al. 2007)  based RCA values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: product--product matrix proximity values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: Hidalgo CA, Klinger B, Barabási , Hausmann R (2007). “Product Space Conditions Development Nations.” Science, 317(5837), 482--487. doi:10.1126/science.1144581 .

what: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: Compute revealed comparative advantage (RCA) index (Balassa 1965)  given dataset.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
code: rca(   data,   binary = TRUE,   threshold = 1,   econ = "economy",   prod = "product",   exp = "export" )

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: data data frame matrix containing data. data frame, columns representing economies, products, export values. matrix, economy--product matrix export values. binary boolean (default = TRUE) specifying whether return binary RCA values (1 RCA >= threshold, 0 otherwise). threshold numeric value (default = 1) specifying threshold binary RCA values. econ character string (default = "economy") specifying column name economies data data frame. prod character string (default = "product") specifying column name products data data frame. exp character string (default = "export") specifying column name export values data data frame.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: economy--product matrix RCA values.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: Balassa B (1965). “Trade Liberalisation ``Revealed'' Comparative Advantage.” Manchester School, 33(2), 99--123. doi:10.1111/j.1467-9957.1965.tb00050.x .
